XenotypeDef.label: Zearot
XenotypeDef.description: The Zearot is an ancient xenotype betrayed by those whom they worshipped. Shipped to the rim world as a punishment for their existence. Over the millenniums, they have evolved to be precise shooters who can see very well at night but are vulnerable to the sun's heat. Feared for their excellent and natural healing abilities, they can fight for longer and harder. Losing the skills of art and farming has left them as superb hunters. Due to their vulnerability, the pigment of their skin is dark slate grey.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Zearot is an ancient xenotype betrayed by those whom they worshipped
